author: psmith
msg: "improved" the Logger name mouse-based ignoring.  Not perfect, but getting better.

author: sdeboy
msg: Adding save support for the color rules - in process.

author: psmith
msg: beginnings of some work to improve usability of the focus on, ignore logger.
within the Logger name tree panel.
If you hold down CTRL the mouse icon changes to a Focus On icon.
This will eventually be hooked up so that while holding down CTRL
and double clicking you can focus on a logger.
Holding down CTRL+SHIFT will be the ignore action.
This mimics the way Photoshop's zoom works.

author: psmith
msg: added reference to a Focus On and an ignore icon

author: psmith
